Reviews.Title: “Stay was OK, but wouldn't recommend”
Reviews.Author: twentyfourthworld
Reviews.Content: pretty looked photos clean tidied towels left day balcony looked onto wall nice smoking possibly shower hotel powerful bathroom bonus location 10 min walk train station 10 trevi fountain piazza venezia honest taxis vatican pantheon found maps little confusing wasnt expensive anyway walls thin sat friends midnight conversation music complained neighbours accused party reception knocked child happily asleep disturbed numerous guests whisper door bathroom swear bedroom ive edge speaking own 10pm incase people complained shower cool flooded lot wet clothes told reception fix wifi signal walk corridor signal annoying beds uncomfortable looked nice hotel convenient clean pretty price noise feel uncomfortable plan conversations past 9pm id prepared assaulted neighbouring guests reception ironic actually soundproofed website

Reviews.Title: “Good value in a great location”
Reviews.Author: markmctaggart
Reviews.Content: stayed 3 nights trip rome walked train station takes 10 minutes taxi walking distance central sights couldnt complain location hotel reception 3rd floor building floors 5th friends 2nd youd expect property double bed tv fridge shower standard staff friendly map marking sights checked overall stay

Reviews.Title: “extra taxes”
Reviews.Author: Peter v Posted by an Easytobook.com traveler
Reviews.Content: day departure pay extra taxes besides ones booking form mentioned letters strange surprise nice washing noises customers hear beautiful view outside temperature adjustable

Reviews.Title: “Rugby Trip to Rome”
Reviews.Author: Michael E Posted by an Easytobook.com traveler
Reviews.Content: location reasonably priced lack tea coffee facilities mattressess bit hard probably due beds brand english speaking channel tv useful essential

Reviews.Title: “Excellent location, great stay”
Reviews.Author: pink_tsk Posted by an Easytobook.com traveler
Reviews.Content: hotel excellent location attractions termini walking distance bit hard signage name plague wall opposite palazzo delle lift tight squeeze lot luggage prepared squeeze walk 3 flights stairs overall spacious fairly comfortable airconditioning wasnt window wifi wasnt bummer kettle thankfully wasnt didnt milk baby overall happy stay

Reviews.Title: “A place to sleep to explore the city on your doorstep”
Reviews.Author: JessW92
Reviews.Content: comes hotel basic bathroom beds comfortable own television italian channels fridge plenty closet space fairly modern bathroom wasnt spectacular view wasnt quietest night time ignored fantastic location ignore extremely disappointing kettle teamaking facilities walked train station 10 minutes hotel main highstreet shops restaurants boyfriend walked near colosseum literally road trevi fountain spanish steps street miles map streets abit mazes afew days attractions metro extremely handy aswell metro vatican city walking wasnt effort pantheon beautiful bridge infront vatican recommend hotel brilliant location boyfriend time hope

Reviews.Title: “Excellent location”
Reviews.Author: lynsayjane
Reviews.Content: travelled italy 30th birthday spent 9 nights staying rome location hotel perfect able explore city foot vatican city probably furthest 3045 mins walk street outside hotel busy noise didnt carry hotel reception noises echo corridor buzzer street level door night noisy manage sleep easily im light sleeper hotel clean furnished bathroom modern spacious hotel left bunch flowers cake birthday mum emailed lovely touch happily return hotel recommend please note hotel 3rd floor lift petite

Reviews.Title: “Great location”
Reviews.Author: bsballbabe
Reviews.Content: hotel fantastic location close colosseum sites metro train station quiet bathroom larger expected halls echo hear shuts door walks hall able windows fresh air street noise plenty restaurantsbars shop grocery store street block nice refrigerator elevator 3 people wo luggage squeeze 4th floor primarily stairs days walking wouldve nice elevator move floor people waiting elevator mind party challenge stairs

Reviews.Title: “Excellent Hotel”
Reviews.Author: ManByTheLee
Reviews.Content: stayed nights hotel bright clean overlooked street bed comfortable welcome walks rome reception staff friendly helpful stay pleasant breakfast fair sweet sweet croissants sweet cake sweet yogurt coffee ok served breakfast prefer eat table bed location close termini walkable central rome major sights walking distance recommend hotel

Reviews.Title: “Excellent hotel”
Reviews.Author: weronika_nadia
Reviews.Content: hotel staff helpful breakfast tasty ideal woman juice youghurt etc location closed di trevi metro station via nazionale nice street noisy cant hear stay hotel thank excellent holidays regards reception mother sister pleased recomend hotel

Reviews.Content: location close foot bus otherwise hotel situated 3rd floor building mentioned bookingscom looked skylight furniture poor drawers chair eat breakfast sitting bed brekfast lobby premises aircondition noisythe staff didnt speak english price charge offer avoid
